data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Khunti to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Khunti, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 322 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 322 believers in Khunti, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: There are 29,300 people living in the county of Khunti. Only about 322 might be believers.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Mewar people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Khunti, Jharkhand, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Khunti, Jharkhand, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Khunti, Jharkhand, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
